languages.text: "Вершить правосудие — одна из обязанностей Вольного Торговца. Я в деле".
"One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."
languages.original_text: "Вершить правосудие — одна из обязанностей Вольного Торговца. Я в деле".

traits.locale_text: "It is one of the Rogue Trader's many duties to mete out justice. I agree."
"It is one of the Rogue Trader's many duties to mete out justice. I agree."
"One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."
"One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."
"One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."
"One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーの数ある任務のひとつは、裁きを下すことだ。わかったよ」
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーの数ある任務のひとつは、裁きを下すことだ。わかったよ」

languages.text: "Es gehört zu den vielen Pflichten {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}, Recht zu sprechen. Ich willige ein."
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: "Es gehört zu den vielen Pflichten {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}, Recht zu sprechen. Ich willige ein."

languages.text: « Rendre la justice est l'un des nombreux devoirs d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. J'accepte. »
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: « Rendre la justice est l'un des nombreux devoirs d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. J'accepte. »

languages.text: «Impartir justicia es una de las numerosas obligaciones de todo Comerciante Independiente. Accederé».
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: «Impartir justicia es una de las numerosas obligaciones de todo Comerciante Independiente. Accederé».

languages.text: “伸张正义确实是行商浪人的职责，我愿意帮忙。”
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: “伸张正义确实是行商浪人的职责，我愿意帮忙。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in vazifelerinden biri de adalet tevzi etmektir. Kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "One of the Rogue Trader's many duties is to mete out justice. I agree."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in vazifelerinden biri de adalet tevzi etmektir. Katılıyorum."
